member.name: STATDATA
member.summary: Contains information used to specify each advisory connection. It is used for enumerating current advisory connections. It holds data returned by the enumerator. This enumerator interface is returned by . Each advisory connection is specified by a unique STATDATA structure.

member.name: STATDATA.formatetc
member.summary: The structure for the data of interest to the advise sink. The advise sink receives notification of changes to the data specified by this FORMATETC structure.

member.name: STATDATA.advf
member.summary: The enumeration value that determines when the advisory sink is notified of changes in the data.

member.name: STATDATA.pAdvSink
member.summary: The pointer for the interface that will receive change notifications.

member.name: STATDATA.dwConnection
member.summary: The token that uniquely identifies the advisory connection. This token is returned by the method that sets up the advisory connection.
